original_text: Bring together enough men to make an army as big as the one that lost the battle. There must be the same number of horses and chariots. Then we will fight the Israelites on the low ground. If we do that, we will surely be stronger than them.’ Ben-Hadad agreed with them. He did what they had suggested.
korean_text: 또 왕의 잃어버린 군대와 같은 군대를 왕을 위하여 보충하고 말은 말대로, 병거는 병거대로 보충하고 우리가 평지에서 그들과 싸우면 반드시 그들보다 강하리이다 왕이 그 말을 듣고 그리하니라

sentences.original_text: to make an army as big as the one
sentences.korean_translation: 패배한 군대만큼 큰 군대를 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: There must be the same number
Then we will fight the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리가 이스라엘 사람들과 싸울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: we will surely be stronger than them
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 확실히 그들보다 더 강할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He did what they had suggested
